data.title: Berlin Opera Academy Summer Program for Emerging Artists
data.meta_description: Training at Berlin Opera Academy for singers and orchestra musicians includes rehearsals, masterclasses by world-class faculty and career mentorship
data.text:
Orchestra: A typical day at BOA

German Language Class 10:00 - 12:00

Improve your German skills and prepare for your next audition with beginner and intermediate language courses.

Movement for Musicians 13:00 - 14:00

Enhance your musicality through focus on body connection.

Production Rehearsals 14:00 - 2 x 2.5 hour rehearsals with a 20 minute break

Experience the rhythm of a theater with intensive rehearsals for festival productions.

Roundtable Discussions & Workshops Group roundtable and workshop topics include: German universities, applying for employment visas, self-promotion and career mentorship. Masterclasses World class conductors and teachers give guidance on technique, presentation, musical style and successful auditioning. SommersoirÃ©es BOA hosts a formal SommersoirÃ©es Series in Berlin where musicians showcase favorite works. Chamber Music Concert BOA hosts a concert series in Berlin where the orchestra can perform chamber music works of their choosing.

Individual lessons are not part of the program, but we are happy to share our extensive network of musician contacts in Berlin with students who wish to make their own arrangements.

Each session is focused on the opera performances, but the week in-between is tailored to the unique needs and desires of our talented orchestra members. Through open communication with our conductors, we make sure that the program is constantly evolving to best suit the group.
